meanings.definition: Following or occurring after an experimental phase.
meanings.sent1: The postexperimental analysis showed the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The researchers conducted a postexperimental study to validate their findings.
meanings.sent3: After the chaotic experiment, the postexperimental calmness was a relief.
meanings.sent4: Her postexperimental approach to problem-solving was refreshing and effective.
meanings.sent5: The postexperimental data provided valuable insights for future research.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a period after experimentation.
meanings.sent1: The postexperimental phase focused on implementing the learnings from the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the postexperimental implications of their innovative ideas.
meanings.sent3: In the postexperimental stage, creativity flourished without constraints.
meanings.sent4: His postexperimental mindset led to breakthrough innovations in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The postexperimental environment fostered collaboration and growth among the team members.
